column4: Can anyone tell me how to enable multi-core support on mencoder
Hey I am just getting into this linux thing :P
I know it's possible there must be someone here who knows how to make mencoder use both cores?
It would make Highlife very happy :)
I know it's possible there must be someone here who knows how to make mencoder use both cores?
I don't think it does because of timing problems
mpeg is definitely SMP enabled, but you'll have to grep the ffmpeg changelog yourself
search that for 'smp' and the things you're trying to transcode from/to - ffmpeg's my transcoder of choice, at least
http://ffmpeg.mplayerhq.hu/documentation.html is pretty good, lots of examples on the net though
if you're trying to use H264, I recommend building your own libx264 and ffmpeg from SVN
the x264 and ffmpeg that ship with Ubuntu has been crippled for copyright reasons
two secs, there should be packages for it out there on the net..
googling because I haven't got them installed here yet either ^^
I'm not having much luck finding anything, I used to have a script to do it - i'm knee deep in Ruby on Rails atm, if I get a chance I'll put it together again this weekend
I'll stick it on my FTP when it's done
